attributes.action: increase the wages of Soldiers serving in Active Duty for our country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our Government pays Privates serving in Afghanistan, and other dangerous areas, a measly £1,268 a month.
Yet MP's get £32,000 a month, sometimes more.
Our soldiers lives are worth more than the pitiful amount the Government is giving them.

This is irrespective of the £2000 bonus, they deserve a PROPER wage based on the work they do and the risks they face.
